name: Knoppers
description: Knoppers is a brand of wafer sandwich filled with nougat and milk creme, produced by August Storck KG.A wafer normally weighs 25 grams and it typically has a light blue white wrapping around it.

name: Millefoglie D'italia Classiche
description: Millefoglies are puffy pastries filled with cream and coated with sugar lining. Made by Vincenzi, the most popular pastry brand in Italy, Millefoglies have a crispy texture with a light, sweet, buttery taste.

name: Fourre Choco Biscuits By Hellema
description: Fourre Choco Biscuits are large, round chocolate-flavored biscuits with a cocoa cream filling. These biscuits are made with all natural ingredients and are manufactured by Hellema, a European snack company that has been baking treats for over 150 years.

name: Isleri Eurocrem Biscuit
description: The Isleri Eurocrem Biscuit is a chocolate covered biscuit with hazelnut creme. The cream is well balanced in sweetness and the chocolate has nice cocoa smell and after taste.

name: Ki-Ki Plus
description: Ki-Ki Plus are fruit-flavored, square shaped toffee candies that are soft and chewy in texture. These candies are called Ki-Ki plus because they are enriched with vitamin C.

name: Biarritz By Delacre
description: Biarritz cookies are vanilla cookies with dark chocolate and coconut sprinkles. These cookies are made in Belgium and are dipped in Belgium chocolate.

name: Pomsticks Sour Cream By Lorenz
description: Pomsticks Sour Cream are sour cream flavored potato sticks. Made with real potatoes and baked in sunflower oil, Pomsticks Source Cream are crunchy in texture and well balanced in taste.

name: Bananko
description: Bananko is a banana-shaped, chocolate covered candy bar with a banana-flavoured foam center.

name: Bassetts Jelly Babies Bag
description: Jelly Babies are a type of soft sugar jelly sweet, shaped as plump babies in a variety of colours. They were first manufactured in Lancashire, England in the 19th century.

name: Kidy Coconut Dessert
description: Kidy Coconut Deserts are chocolate bars with a chewy, coconut-flavored filling in the center. These chocolate bars are very sweet with a distinct coconut taste.
